context: The word 'toitu' is the partitive case singular form of the Estonian noun 'toit', meaning 'food'. In this context, it indicates an unspecified amount or portion of food. The dictionary shows it's used in sentences describing eating behavior - specifically when someone eats something greedily or avidly.
